June 9, 1991 D Swindon Entertainment Contest (Section 2)
Swindon Entertainment Contest (Section 2) 20 Entertainments Contest Swindon Entertainment Contest swindon-brass-festival-section-2
None
Wyvern Theatre, Swindon 1st prize: £175 and the Arkell Trophy. 2nd prize: £100 and the Courage Trophy. 3rd prize: £75 and trophy. Best Soloist: King George V Trophy. Presentation/deportment: Norman Fisher Trophy - Chinnor.
Draw 12.45 pm, commence 1.30 pm.
For 2nd/3rd/4th section bands.
